en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Health & Happiness Festival 2009!
en.content:
REPORT FROM FUSIONEXCEL EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR JASEN KHOO.

In conjunction with the Health and Happiness Festival 2009, a Gala Dinner under the Patronage of Duli Yang Maha Mulia Sultanah of Pahang Sultanah Hajjah Kalsom was held on 19th March 2009 at the JW Marriott, Kuala Lumpur. The Gala Dinner was a fundraising event for the Wealth of Women Centre for underprivileged and abused women.

At the dinner, FusionExcel, represented by Presidential Director Fay Lim, presented a mock cheque of RM 10,000 to Duli Yang Maha Mulia Sultanah of Pahang, witnessed by Madam Myriam Oliveres, CEO of Health Sense Sdn. Bhd., the Organizer of the Health and Happiness Festival 2009.

FusionExcel was also represented by FusionExcel Leaders Alex Long, Jasen Khoo, Kevin Lim and Albert Lim.

FusionExcel Leaders took the opportunity to perform demonstrations of the Quantum Pendant for the benefit of Mr. Mike M. Davis, a member of the renowned singing group, The Platters, and Mr. Manuel Llaser, an internationally renowned Spanish magician, both performers at the event. Both performers were impressed with the demonstrations and were enthusiastic to visit FusionExcel’s exhibition booth at the Health and Happiness Festival 2009 to be held on 21st and 22nd March 2009 at the Grand Millennium, Kuala Lumpur, to learn more about the product. Other diners, such as renowned local singer, Zainal Abidin, would also visit FusionExcel’s exhibition booth.
